name: Websocket
comment: @docs Connection, SendError, close, createHandle, listen, sendString

unions.name: SendError
unions.comment: Errors that might happen when sending data.

values.name: createHandle
values.comment: Create a websocket handle that you can then open by calling listen or sendString.

values.name: listen
values.comment: Listen for incoming messages through a websocket connection. You'll also get notified if the connection closes.
